purpose: Demonstrate the capabilities of chat bots using different AI models and frameworks within the Panel ecosystem.
principle: Utilizes Panel for creating interactive web apps and integrates with various AI models and frameworks such as LangChain and OpenAI for chat functionalities.
reusability: Examples can be adapted for different chat bot implementations using Panel and various AI models; provides a foundation for developing custom chat solutions.
limitations: Primarily intended for demonstration and educational purposes; may require additional customization for production use.
name: panel-chat-examples
description: Examples of Chat Bots using Panels chat features: Traditional, LLMs, AI Agents, LangChain, OpenAI etc
highlight: Showcases integration of various chat bot frameworks and AI models using Panel's chat features.
